name: Gang Beasts Pocket Edition
description:
Gang Beasts is a silly multiplayer party game with surly gelatinous characters, brutal slapstick fight sequences, and absurd hazardous environments, set in the mean streets of Beef City.

Customise your character and fight local and online enemies in the melee game mode or fight with friends against the gangs of Beef City in the gang game mode.

Fight alone in offline mode or play multiplayer with your friends or against them. The most hilarious jelly characters with funny physics are waiting for you! Enter your name, select character, select map and let’s the fight begin!

Features:
-Offline mode
-Multiplayer mode
-Character selection
-Map selection
-Funny jelly characters and physics
